classes.Description: An introduction to the principles of management, focusing on the organizational and behavioral aspects of management in a variety of business contexts.
This course covers the fundamentals of negotiation and sales strategies, providing students with practical skills and techniques for successful sales outcomes.
A study of the legal and ethical issues in business, examining the impact of laws and ethical standards on business operations and decision-making.
This course focuses on developing leadership skills, exploring various leadership styles and their effectiveness in different organizational contexts.
A capstone course that integrates knowledge and skills from previous business courses, emphasizing strategic management and decision-making.
An exploration of artificial intelligence applications in career development, including resume building, job search strategies, and interview preparation.
A general study hall class providing a quiet and resourceful environment for students to focus on their studies and complete assignments.
